thread.title: Samsung's fourth quarter earnings guidance underwhelms in turnaround year

title: Samsung's fourth quarter earnings guidance underwhelms in turnaround year
text:
Samsung's fourth quarter earnings guidance underwhelms in turnaround year 12:54pm GMT - 01:11 
Samsung's set to report record fourth quarter results for 2017 later this month, but its profit guidance fell short of the street's estimates in a turnaround year for the Korean chip giant. Sareena Dayaram reports.
